name: Cross Match!
description:
1. “Cross Match!” is a simple and fun casual game, but addictive.
2. Two game modes: Endless mode and Challenges mode.
3. Endless mode: If you want to get a higher score, you must be quick with hands and sharp-sighted.
4. Challenges mode: More than 100 levels. In each level, you need to complete the corresponding task within a limited time.
5. Once you click on a blank space that the intersection of the same tiles, they will jump and then fall.
6. There are more than ten different types of colorful titles. As long as you persist long enough, you will can see all the types of tiles.
7. Try it right now! How many points can you get? Good luck!
